summary: Seasoned Project Management, Project Execution and Project Controls/Services professional with close to 35 years of international experience in companies part of the Royal Dutch Shell group – mainly in oil/gas Exploration & Production and both in green and brown field projects. I elected to take early retirement from Shell per the 1st of January 2014. Since then interested in and available for ad hoc, short jobs – like capital project reviews, either in- or outside the oil/gas industry, and project management training – where my skills and experience can be applied beneficially. In addition, I am active on voluntary basis – e.g. as KIVI 'Engineering Coach’ (coaching colleagues in KIVI, the Dutch Royal Institute of Engineers) and chairman of the KIVI Noord-Holland region.
